data.eml:eml: Revision of the asychis species group of Aphelinus (Hymenoptera: Aphelinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shirley, Xanthe A., Woolley, James B., Hopper, Keith R. (2017): Revision of the asychis species group of Aphelinus (Hymenoptera: Aphelinidae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 54: 1-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.10457, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.10457
